title: Gorbachev to Yeltsin was regime change

content.prompt: Which of the following is the best example of regime change?

choices.label: The transfer of power from Gordon Brown to David Cameron
The transfer of power from Mikhail Gorbachev to Boris Yeltsin
The transfer of power from Umaru Musa Yar’Adua to Goodluck Jonathan
The transfer of power from Felipe Calderón to Enrique Peña Nieto
The transfer of power from Hu Jintao to Xi Jinping

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
